replies.author: Savanah
replies.text: I was thinking the same thing today. :) But they have selectively placed the government depends in high populated areas that will turn the state blue....Illinois is the same. My state is same....all government housing is in the 3 largest counties, the go blue, but enough of us vote republican that the state turns red. I believe it is like that in every state, government depends in the most populated areas because that can win the state.
